text: Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut?
He just needed a little space.
I always wanted to be an astronaut,
But I was afraid of heights.
dialogs.badReaction: You think it's funny? Dreams matter!
dialogs.next: Anyway, on to a lighter note...

text: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
dialogs.goodReaction: Bears and jokes, a perfect match!
dialogs.badReaction: That was a good one, you're tough to please!
dialogs.next: You know, I once had a pet bear...

text: Just kidding. But I always wanted a pet.
dialogs.goodReaction: You understand, it's nice to connect.
dialogs.badReaction: Too cold-hearted for pets, I see.

text: Why don't skeletons fight each other?
I used to get into a lot of fights as a kid.
I guess I had a lot of anger.
I wrote a song about a tortilla.
Well, itâ€™s more of a wrap.
dialogs.badReaction: Not a fan of wraps, I see.

text: But I never learned to play an instrument.
dialogs.badReaction: So, you don't care about music?
